name: Space Dash - Endless Galaxy Shooter Arcade
name_original: Space Dash - Endless Galaxy Shooter Arcade
description:
Space Dash is endless galactic arcade shooter! What is the highest score you can get?

Prepare yourself for this near impossible shooter in the world of Space Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you shot your way through space, whilst avoiding stars, planets and asteroids!

One touch game play with endless boundaries that will keep you entertained for hours!

Game Features:
• Endless space shooter arcade game;
• Simple yet stunning graphics and game play;
• No one game is the same; and
• Game Center integration, so you can play with and challenge your friends!

Challenge yourself with this near impossible, endless style galactic space shooter game!
